title: knowledge
comment: A state of awareness and understanding, resulting from information which has been obtained or revealed concerning people or objects. Scripture stresses God's total knowledge of his creation and also the importance of his people knowing his will and purposes for them.

children.title: knowledge, God's of humanity
children.comment: God knows all people comprehensively, their nature, their deeds and their thoughts. He understands every aspect of their lives, past, present and future.

children.title: He knows them individually and intimately
He knows their needs and troubles
He knows their needs and troubles
He knows their past and future
knowledge, God as source of human
children.comment: All knowledge proceeds from God, although many do not acknowledge it. The pursuit of knowledge apart from God is futile and leads to pride.

children.title: God is the source of all knowledge
Pursuit of knowledge apart from God led to the fall
Pursuit of knowledge apart from God is futile
Pursuit of the knowledge that proceeds from God merits divine approval
God bestows knowledge on certain individuals
knowledge, of God
children.comment: Human knowledge of God may be a purely intellectual phenomenon, as when one knows about God through observing the results of his actions, but God's people know him in a personal way because of their relationship with him.

children.title: Knowledge of God through his actions
God acts in saving his people
God's people know him through his dealings with them
God provides and cares for his people
God judges and restores his people
Knowledge of God leads to confidence in him
knowledge, of Jesus Christ
children.comment: The believer's understanding and experience of Jesus Christ, which arises from a personal relationship established through faith.

children.title: Jesus Christ is the supreme revelation of God
Knowledge of Jesus Christ acquired through a personal relationship with him

knowledge, of sin
children.comment: Originating with the fall, it is revealed by conscience, the law and the Holy Spirit.
